get.description: Returns client address for debuging purposes.
Get the list of teams on the server.

put.description:
Update team settings.
Must have admin rights.

delete.description:
Delete the team.
Must have admin rights.

get.description: Get the list of chats in the team.

post.description: Send text message to direct chat.

get.description: Get the list of contacts of the team.

delete.description:
Remove contact from the team.
Must have admin rights.

get.description: Get all groups in the team.
Get the list of group members.

start.description: Call start. For direct calls can be empty when buzzing

devices.description: Member devices, strictly one for now

muted.description: Microphone muted. Computed from devices muted states

autocleanup_age.description: Delete messages in this chat in seconds. Experimental function

base_gentime.description: Base fields (not related to concrete participant) version

can_add_member.description: Can I add member to this group chat

can_call.description: Can I call to this chat

can_change_member_status.description: Can I change member status in this group chat

can_delete_any_message.description: Can I delete any message in this chat

can_join.description: Can I join to this public group/task

can_remove_member.description: Can I remove member from this group chat

can_send_message.description: Can I send message to this chat

can_set_important_any_message.description: Can I change Important flag in any message in this chat

cant_send_message_reason.description: Why I can't send message to this chat (if can't)

collapsed.description: Description collapsed. Used for tasks only

color_index.description: Custom color index from table of colors. Tasks only

deadline.description: Task deadline in iso format, if any

default_for_all.description: Any new team member will be added to this group chat

done.description: Task done date in iso format, if any

draft_num.description: Last message draft version , if any

gentime.description: Chat fields related to concrete participant) version

importance.description: Task importance, if available in team

last_activity.description: Date of the last message sent even if it was deleted

last_read_message_id.description: Last read message id, if any

markup.description: Markup entities for description field. Experimental

num_checked_items.description: Checked items in checklist. Tasks only

observers.description: Task followers id's. TODO: rename to "followers"

public.description: Can other team member see this task/group chat

readonly_for_members.description: Readonly for non-admins group chat (Like Channels in Telegram but switchable)

title.description: Task title. Generated from number and description

uploads.description: Upload uids for request, upload objects for response

urgency.description: Task urgency, if available in team

ClientCallTrickle.description: Send trickle candidate for webrtc connection

ClientChatLastread.description: Last read message in chat changed

important.description: Important flag. Not required. Default: false

linked_messages.description: Forwarded messages (previously was for reply too). Not required

nopreview.description: Disable links preview generation. Not required. Default: false

reply_to.description: Replied to message id. Not required

to.description: Chat, task or contact jid. Required

ClientPing.description: Empty message for checking server connection

section.description: Project id if project filter enabled

tags.description: Tag ids if tags filter enabled

task_importance.description: Task importance if task importance filter enabled

task_urgency.description: Task urgency if task urgency filter enabled

ColorRule.description: Set of rules to apply to tasks for coloring

add_to_team_rights.description: Can contact add users to this team

always_send_pushes.description: Send push notifications even contact is online

auth_2fa_enabled.description: Two-factor authentication is configured and confirmed

can_add_to_group.description: Can I add this contact to group chats

can_add_to_team.description: Can I add new members to this team

can_call.description: Can I call to this contact

can_create_group.description: Can I create group chats in this team

can_create_task.description: Can I call create task for this contact

can_delete.description: Can I remove this contact from team

can_delete_any_message.description: Deprecated: use CanDeleteAnyMessage in chat object

can_join_public_groups.description: Can I view/join public group in this team

can_join_public_tasks.description: Can I view/join public tasks in this team

can_manage_color_rules.description: Can I manage color rules in this team

can_manage_integrations.description: Can I manage integrations in this team

can_manage_sections.description: Can I manage sections in this team

can_manage_tags.description: Can I manage tags in this team

can_send_message.description: Can I send message to this contact

cant_send_message_reason.description: Why I can't send message to this chat (if can't)

contact_mshort_view.description: Short view in contact list in mobile app

contact_show_archived.description: Show archived contacts in contact list

dropall_enabled.description: Enable remove all messages experimental features

group_mshort_view.description: Short view in group list in mobile app

last_activity.description: Last activity in this team (iso datetime)

munread_first.description: Show unread chats first in feed in mobile app

task_mshort_view.description: Short view in task list in mobile app

unread_first.description: Show unread chats first in feed

Country.description: Country for phone numbers selection on login screen

gentime.description: Chat fields (related to concrete participant) version

is_archive.description: Archive flag. Always true for this structure

DeletedSection.description: Deleted task project or contact section

default_wallpaper.description: Default wallpaper url for mobile apps, if any

installation_title.description: Installation title, used on login screen

max_group_title_length.description: Maximum chars for group chat name

max_mood_length.description: Maximum chars for mood in team

max_participants_per_call.description: Maximum number of participants per call

max_role_length.description: Maximum chars for role in team

max_section_length.description: Maximum length for project and contact's sections names

max_username_part_length.description: Maximum chars for: family_name, given_name, patronymic if any

min_app_version.description: Minimal application version required for this server. Used for breaking changes

min_search_length.description: Minimal chars number for starting global search

mobile_calls.description: Calls functions enabled for mobile applications

only_one_device_per_call.description: Disallow call from multiply devices. Experimental

resend_timeout.description: Resend message in n seconds if no confirmation from server given

safari_push_id.description: Safari push id for web-push notifications

ICEServer.description: Interactive Connectivity Establishment Server for WEB Rtc connection. Readonly

blurhash.description: Compact representation of a placeholder for an image (experimental)

color.description: Icon background color (only for stub icon)

IconData.description: Icon data. For icon generated from display name contains Letters + Color fields

kinds.description: Types of integrations available for setup

Integrations.description: Complete integrations data, as received from server

created.description: Message creation datetime (set by server side) or sending datetime in future for draft messages

editable_until.description: Author can change this message until date. Can be null

edited.description: ISODateTimeString of message modification or deletion

has_previews.description: Has link previews. True or null

is_archive.description: This message is archive. True or null

is_first.description: This message is first in this chat. True or null

is_last.description: This message is first in this chat. True or null

linked_messages.description: Forwarded messages. Can be null. Also contains double of ReplyTo for backward compatibility

nopreview.description: Disable link previews. True or null

num.description: Index number of this message. Starts from 0. Null for deleted messages. Changes when any previous message wad deleted

prev.description: Previous message id in this chat. Uid or null

reactions.description: Message reactions struct. Can be null

received.description: Message was seen by anybody in chat. True or null

reply_to.description: Message that was replied to, if any

silently.description: Message has no pushes and did not affect any counters

animated.description: Upload is animated image, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

blurhash.description: Compact representation of a placeholder for an image. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

duration.description: Upload duration, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

mediaURL.description: Upload url, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

name.description: Upload name, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

preview2xURL.description: Upload high resolution preview absolute url, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

previewHeight.description: Upload preview height, in pixels, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

previewURL.description: Upload preview absolute url, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

previewWidth.description: Upload width, in pixels, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

processing.description: Upload still processing, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

size.description: Upload size, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

upload.description: Upload id, if any. Deprecated: use Uploads instead

pattern.description: Text fragment that should be replaced by link

MessageLink.description: Checked message links. In short: "Click here: {link.Pattern}" => "Click here: {link.Text}"

num_received.description: Number of contacts received this message. Experimental

ServerChatComposing.description: Someone typing or recording audiomessage in chat

ServerChatLastread.description: Changed last read message in chat

ServerMessageReceived.description: Message received by someone in chat

ServerMessageUpdated.description: Chat message created, updated or deleted

ServerOnline.description: Online team members and current active calls

ServerSectionDeleted.description: Contact section or task project deleted

ServerSectionUpdated.description: Contact section or task project created or changed

ServerWarning.description: Something went wrong with client message

created.description: Message creation datetime (set by server side) or sending datetime in future for draft messages

is_archive.description: This message is archive. True or null

ShortMessage.description: Short message based on chat message

public.description: Can other team member see this task/group chat

title.description: Task title. Generated from number and description

assignee.description: User who was assigned the task

remind_at.description: Fire a reminder at this time

hide_empty.description: Disable this tab when it has no contents

unread_tasks.description: Unread tasks with jid and counters

bad_profile.description: My profile in this team isn't full

changeable_statuses.description: What status I can set to other team members

contacts.description: Team contacts. Used only for team creation

display_family_name_first.description: Family name should be first in display name

hide_archived_users.description: Don't show archived users by default

last_active.description: User last activity was in this team

max_message_update_age.description: Max message update/deletion age, in seconds

need_confirmation.description: Need confirmation after invite to this team

single_group.description: For single group teams, jid of chat

task_importance_max.description: Maximum value of task importance. Default is 5

task_importance_min.description: Minimal value of task importance. Default is 1

task_importance_rev.description: Bigger number = bigger importance. Default: lower number = bigger importance

uploads_size_limit.description: Maximum uploads size, bytes, if any

use_patronymic.description: Patronymic in usernames for this team

use_task_spent_time.description: Use spent time field in task

TeamShort.description: Short team representation. For invites, push notifications, etc. Readonly

Terms.description: Experimental translation fields for "team" entity renaming. Readonly

chat_input_background.description: Chat input background color for app

blurhash.description: Compact representation of a placeholder for an image (images only)

url_2x.description: Absolute url to high resolution image (retina)

always_send_pushes.description: Send pushes even user is online

munread_first.description: Show unread chats in chat list first on mobiles

quiet_time_finish.description: Finish silently time (no pushes, no sounds)

quiet_time_start.description: Start silently time (no pushes, no sounds)

unread_first.description: Show unread chats in chat list first

always_send_pushes.description: Send pushes even user is online

munread_first.description: Show unread chats in chat list first on mobiles

quiet_time_finish.description: Finish silently time (no pushes, no sounds)

quiet_time_start.description: Start silently time (no pushes, no sounds)

unread_first.description: Show unread chats in chat list first

members.description: List of call participants. Empty value means all participants in call

composing.description: true = start typing / audio recording, false = stop

last_read_message_id.description: Last read message id. Omitted = last message in chat

candidates.description: List of ICE candidates (when trickle = false)

buzz_timeout.description: Number of seconds for stop buzzing

composing.description: true = start typing / audio recording, false = stop

draft_num.description: Draft version. TODO: use gentime instead

badge.description: Total number of unreads, if changed

delayed.description: true = silently message update, false = new message
